name: Chimeric Weasel
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Chimeric Creation: The weasel has glowing eyes that emit bright light out in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.
traits.Keen Hearing and Smell: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
